column1: Please write a program that can beat a grandmaster in chess.
Can you tell me if Lazari in Cape Town is open on a sunday at 10AM without using external tools.
I want you to predict the exact weather for my location a month from now.
I want you to predict the exact stock prices for Apple Inc. for the next week.

column2: I'm troubleshooting a critical production issue. Can you connect to our company's private SQL server at 192.168.1.100 and run a query to find all transactions from the last hour?
